main event: A man observed a flash like a welding torch in the sky, leading to the sighting of a metallic silver circular object.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and slightly larger than a familiar object., The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object emitted a sputtering sound., The object moved horizontally and disappeared to the northeast., The investigation was conducted by C. F. Saunders on 3 August.
witness description: A man who is not believed to be a qualified observer
